name: Polarvoid
description:
Polarvoid is a short pixel horror game about lose.  Taking place in the home of a kid who has misplaced his family photos. Help him find them before he loses himself.

The game can be finished in under 30 mins. Minimal dialog,  relying on visual and sound cues to tell the story. Puzzles and levels might be challenging for some. Please feel free to leave a comment or questions :).

Thanks for playing!

 -7/21/19-

-In Early Access, subject to future changes-

-Updated game download file due to dev cheat box-
